title: Moring Breif
body: Commander Greyson, We regret to inform you that last night at 21:42 a bomb was dropped. A bomb of the likes we've never seen before. This development has caught us offgaurd. Due to this event, we are fasttracking the creation of the atomic commission. This commission will bring together the brightest minds of our time to build the best bomb; the greatest. Regards, Commander Neil
